Name: Time Gentlemen, Please! and Ben There, Dan That! Special Edition  Double Pack
About the game: Ben There, Dan That! and Time Gentlemen, Please! are a couple of rip-roaring point-and-click adventure games . With tongue firmly in cheek, sit back, relax, and put your mind to work solving puzzles, and reading some very funny dialogue. It's like a book, only good! From an horrific and untimely death in deep, dark Peru, via preposterous-and-suspect alien invasions, to whipping back-and-forth in time to stop Hitler and his army of robot Nazi dinosaur clones, this is one set of adventures you're unlikely to forget. Key features: Funny words that'll actually probably make you laugh out loud! Graphics AND sound effects! Thousands of unique responses for almost every action you can think of! NAZI DINOSAURS!
